3809012.title: [Feature] Automate CI/CD Build Pipelines for OSI Services
3809012.description:
This PR introduces an automated CI/CD pipeline setup for OSI services.

Key Features:
- Implements GitHub Actions for automated builds and deployments.
- Ensures linting, testing, and security checks are integrated into the pipeline.
- Provides rollback mechanisms for failed deployments.

Expected Impact:
- Reduces manual effort in managing builds and deployments.
- Improves release efficiency and service reliability.
- Enhances developer productivity with streamlined workflows.

Testing:
- Verified build and deployment workflows in a staging environment.
- Ensured rollback mechanisms function correctly in case of failures.
- Gathered feedback from developers for further improvements.

3810125.title: [Improvement] Enhance CI/CD Pipeline Logging for OSI
3810125.description:
This PR improves logging mechanisms within the CI/CD pipeline.

Key Changes:
- Adds structured logs for each step in the pipeline.
- Improves error reporting to provide actionable insights.
- Enables centralized logging for better debugging.

Expected Impact:
- Makes troubleshooting deployment issues easier.
- Improves visibility into build and deployment processes.
- Helps engineering teams respond to failures more quickly.

Testing:
- Conducted end-to-end tests to verify log accuracy.
- Simulated failure scenarios to check log usefulness.
- Collected feedback from SREs and developers.

3811984.title: [Feature] Build Dashboard to Monitor Service Health in Cosmic
3811984.description:
This PR introduces a real-time dashboard to monitor OSI service health.

Key Features:
- Visualizes key performance metrics for OSI services.
- Provides real-time alerts for service degradation or failures.
- Integrates with existing logging and monitoring systems.

Expected Impact:
- Enhances observability and troubleshooting capabilities.
- Helps teams quickly respond to incidents.
- Reduces downtime by enabling proactive monitoring.

Testing:
- Deployed the dashboard in a test environment.
- Verified real-time updates and alert accuracy.
- Collected user feedback for further refinements.
